description: Only shows 1 icon of UNKOWN. Doesn't work for me.

I have several books in PDF form. Upon opening the app, you there is a book called "Unknown" and it doesn't let you delete it. I added 1 book, but it won't let me add any others after the first. The one book I did add showed a thumbnail for the cover during the adding process, but didn't show it in the library. I would love to see this get updated to be functional, but for now, it isn't working.
summary: Useful Idea, but doesn't work for me

description: This is actually a good app, my only complaint is that it doesn't have dark mode.
